text:
@realDonaldTrump US RECESSION BEGAN IN FEBRUARY

3 million jobs lost in January
Before #COVID19 lockdowns

Trumps admin was already stretched to its limit covering up job losses and Trumps crimes. And 110,000 dead and 41 Million more jobs lost cuz they were busy with coverups
